name: Atarenium Falcon
overview: Here we are with another game. This time you will face evil Amigans Empire and their treacherous leader Great Miner as Captain Tramiel - brave and cunning commodore of Atarenium Falcon. Prototype space vessel with built-in powerful processing unit - Atari Falcon powered by eco pea-coal. Well... at least you will try to reclaim as much coal as you can get. Coal, that was stolen from Atari Tribe by the Amigans....
